title: Index of Max Element
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use the built-in `max()` and `list.index()` functions in Python to find the index of the maximum element in a list.

meta.title: Index of Max Element in Python
meta.description: Find the index of the maximum element in a list of numbers using Python.
meta.keywords: max element, python, list, index, programming
